alert.note: Alert for Green; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 9:59PM CDT until April 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR EASTERN GREEN AND NORTHWESTERN ROCK COUNTIES... At 958 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brodhead, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Large hail was reported just across the state line in Wisconsin, south of Monroe. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Edgerton, Evansville, Brodhead, Orfordville, Brooklyn, Monticello, Albany, Footville, Fulton, Magnolia, Dayton, Attica, Cooksville, Juda, Indianford, and Leyden. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
